title: Gave my friends a mystery icon gift. Took my BE. They didn't receive it.
body: I gifted 2 of my friends a mystery icon yesterday and it took my blue essence but they didn't receive it, they relogged and still didn't get it. It's not even showing on my purchase history.  {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: I was able to double check both of the accounts you sent those gifts too, and one account did get the Pix icon while the other did receive the Pentakill Sona icon. Have you friends double check their icon collection, and be sure to scroll down to check for those. If they still don't see them for some reason, have them each submit a ticket with screenshots so we can see what's going wrong.
Alright. Thank you for your fast response and help!
